q: Chrysler just started making its refreshed 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country in Windsor, Ontario, today but Fiat/Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne was already pondering the next-generation van. We need to completely rethink the minivan, he told the AP's Dee-Ann Durbin at the plant in Canada.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.''
